title: StarCraft 2 - MASS HYDRA HEADBUTT | Resurrection ICYFAR G2
excerpt: In this week’s episode of I Cast Your Freakin Awesome Replays (ICYFAR) players sent in their StarCraft 2 replays where they had crazy comebacks! Here’s a fun game of zerg versus terran completing the challenge in humorous fashion.   NEW ICYFAR CHALLENGE: Destroy The Means of Production! Harass the workers
